name: The Mysterious Disappearance of Unicorn Blue
name_original: The Mysterious Disappearance of Unicorn Blue
description:
The Crimson Bull has put Unicorn Blue under an evil spell to hide her and stop her from caring for the enchanted forest. She needs you to find her magic charms to charge her spirit and break the evil spell that was put on her by the Crimson Bull or the beauty of the enchanted forest will be lost forever. Fair warning: you will have to outwit the devil donkeys along the way. Are you ready to help find Unicorn Blue? Hooray! Let's get started.  Click the Start Button and use the arrow keys (UDLR) to move and turn.  Use the space bar to jump and the back button in your browser to come back to Itch.io.  

Goto https://www.goldenpoppy.net to get full access, no ads now!
